plot:
In 1950 professor Kurt Drøvel vanished while exploring the unchartered 
river Overfloden outside of Oslo, Norway. All rescue attempts failed. 28
 years later, the brothers Dal have started a journey, by canoe, up 
Overfloden, in order to establish what really happened to professor 
Drøvel.              Fuente: IMDb
title: Brødrene Dal og professor Drøvels hemmelighet
